diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: Mr. B has been living with AIDS for nearly 15 years with multiple complications from antiretroviral therapy, which include lipodystrophy. He exhibits facial lipoatrophy and anterior cervical lipohypertrophy. The diagnosis of HIV-associated lipodystrophy is substantiated by his medication history, particularly the use of antiretroviral drugs like stavudine and zidovudine linked to fat loss, along with clinical manifestations that have caused him significant distress.
